statements: SELECT * FROM SolarPowerData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date FROM SolarPowerData WHERE solar_power_generation > 1000;
SELECT solar_power_generation FROM SolarPowerData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM SolarPowerData WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, solar_power_generation FROM SolarPowerData ORDER BY solar_power_generation DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPowerData ORDER BY date DESC, id ASC
SELECT id, date FROM SolarPowerData WHERE solar_power_generation > 100 ORDER BY solar_power_generation DESC
SELECT AVG(solar_power_generation) as avg_solar_power FROM SolarPowerData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, date, solar_power_generation FROM SolarPowerData WHERE MONTH(date) = 6 ORDER BY solar_power_generation DESC
SELECT * FROM SolarPowerData WHERE solar_power_generation BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM historical_solar_power_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, power_output FROM historical_solar_power_data WHERE power_output > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_solar_power_data WHERE power_output < 50 ORDER BY power_output ASC, date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY precipitation DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_solar_power_data ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT date, power_output FROM historical_solar_power_data WHERE power_output > 500 ORDER BY date, time;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 30 AND precipitation > 0;
SELECT SUM(power_output) AS total_output FROM historical_solar_power_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT date, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25;
SELECT * FROM historical_solar_power_data
SELECT date, generation_amount FROM historical_solar_power_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT city, state, country FROM location_data WHERE country='USA'
SELECT temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30
SELECT id, date, temperature, precipitation FROM historical_solar_power_data JOIN weather_data ON historical_solar_power_data.date = weather_data.date
SELECT date, generation_amount FROM historical_solar_power_data WHERE generation_amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT city, state, country FROM location_data WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC
SELECT temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 0.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT city, state, country, temperature FROM location_data JOIN weather_data ON location_data.date = weather_data.date WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature ASC

SELECT city, generation_amount FROM location_data JOIN historical_solar_power_data ON location_data.date = historical_solar_power_data.date WHERE generation_amount > 200 ORDER BY generation_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM SolarPowerData;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SolarLocations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT date, power_generation FROM SolarPowerData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT date, consumption FROM PowerConsumption WHERE consumption < 500 ORDER BY consumption ASC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPowerData WHERE power_generation > 100
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SolarLocations WHERE location_name = 'Home'
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT date, consumption FROM PowerConsumption ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(power_generation) AS average_generation, MAX(power_generation) AS max_generation FROM SolarPowerData
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT installation_id, location, start_date FROM installations WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT brand, series, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency >= 20.0;
SELECT date, time, power_generated FROM solar_generation WHERE power_generated > 100 ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT installation_id, location FROM installations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT panel_id, brand, series, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 20 ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT date, time, power_generated FROM solar_generation WHERE date = '2021-09-15' ORDER BY time ASC;
